timeline.bodyText: we can remove these once the callers are Kotlinized
timeline.author: ahmedre

timeline.bodyText: Serializable so it can be moved into a jvm only module
timeline.author: ahmedre
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@
+package com.quran.labs.androidquran.data
+
+import java.io.Serializable
+
+data class SuraAyah(
+  @JvmField val sura: Int,
+  @JvmField val ayah: Int
+) : Comparable<SuraAyah>, Serializable {
